short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connecting to the Zenon NoM from your browser...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Connect from your browser to the Zenon Network of Momentum! 

ZenonBrowserWallet provides you basic wallet features like showing your balance, sending and receiving transactions, signing transactions originating from web3 websites, managing trusted websites, etc.
